Class Instruction

java.lang.Object
bec.instruction.Instruction
Direct Known Subclasses:
ADD, AND, ASSIGN, BDEST, BJUMP, BJUMPIF, BSEG, CALL, COMPARE, CONVERT, DECO, DELETE, DEREF, Descriptor, DINITAREA, DIST, DIV, DSIZE, DUP, EMPTY, EQV, EVAL, FDEST, FETCH, FJUMP, FJUMPIF, GETO, GOTO, IMP, INCO, INDEX, INITAREA, INITO, LINE, LOCATE, MULT, NEG, NOT, OR, POP, POPALL, PUSH, PUSHC, PUSHLEN, REFER, REM, REMOTE, RUPDATE, SDEST, SELECT, SETO, SHIFT, SUB, UPDATE, XOR, ZEROAREA
public class Instruction extends Object

S-INSTRUCTION:

instruction ::= constant_declaration ::= record_descriptor | routine_specification ::= stack_instruction | assign_instruction ::= addressing_instruction | protect_instruction ::= temp_control | access_instruction ::= arithmetic_instruction | convert_instruction ::= jump_instruction | goto_instruction ::= if_instruction | skip_instruction ::= segment_instruction | call_instruction ::= area_initialisation | eval_instruction ::= info_setting | macro_call
